name: The Shadowed Dungeons
description:
THIS GAME IS FAIRLY DIFFICULT AT TIMES

The Sequel to "Lost In The Shadows"

Xesia's shadow has reunited with Xesia, but now other shadows are against her

Defeat as many enemies in these dungeons to weaken the shadow dimension

But beware of the shadow doppelganger that copies your movement and can damage you if it touches you

Controls:

Movement: A,S,W,D

Shoot: Left-Mouse Click

Use Ability 1: Q

Use Ability 2: E

Pick Up Item: F

Return to Menu: Escape
